data.title: The OFTC Foundation
data.meta_description: The OFTC Foundation, Inc. is an independent nonprofit 501(c)(3) organization established to support students and programs at the college.
data.text:
The OFTC Foundation, Inc. is an independent nonprofit 501(c)(3) organization established to support students and programs at Oconee Fall Line Technical College.

The Foundation is governed by a local board of trustees whose mission is to maintain a focus on local campus needs that mirrors the direction of Oconee Fall Line Technical College. Donors’ wishes will be adhered to and existing donor agreements will continue to be enforced.

Your Gift Matters

How You Can Support OFTC

The Foundation provides leadership and community influence through the College’s eleven-county service area of Bleckley, Dodge, Glascock, Hancock, Jefferson, Laurens, Telfair, Warren, Washington, Wheeler, and Wilkinson.

Trustees

Scholarships
